column4: does anyone have experience with apache2 virtual host configuration
Some, but I need a cigarette, so I'll be gone for ~10 minutes
in the root directory configuration section, check to see if it has "Order deny, allow Deny from all" and remove it if it does
what's the full line from the vhost.log?
what's under the Directory directive for your DocumentRoot?
oh, and should probably make sure, you're running Apache 2.2, correct?
sounds like your config files aren't being read correctly (or it's reading the wrong ones)
fight with Apache long enough and you will be
it should just be getting the directories pointed to the right place now (ie, putting the right paths in)
